fields.name: Ruby Sightstone
fields.description: +400 Health UNIQUE Passive - Ward Refresh: Holds 5 charges and refills upon visiting the shop. UNIQUE Active - Ghost Ward: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 3 minutes. A player may only have 3 Stealth Wards on the map at one time. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
